title: The Princess Helps Her Sister To Be the Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Corruption   Handsome Male Lead   Unconditional Love
author: 책도둑
description:
“… luna. Please live, don’t forget me.”

“Dearon … No…!”

A poor man, sacrificed his life in order to protect the life of his lover, a traitor.

‘Now you are in front of me, holding by my arms’.

“Is it everything ok, princess?”

The only thing that she can do for him in order to protect him is helping  her half-sister and win the war once again.

Not being his lover again.

‘However, I might not stop loving you.

No matter how much this new life can changed, I’ll never stop loving you.’

“…This time, I’ll protect you”>
